name: Evan (Team Timon)
description: In this game, you take on the role of a young orphan who must find a way to escape from the orphanage you are trapped in. As you explore the orphanage, you come across  a variety of puzzles which will unlock doors and progress you through the building. One example of a puzzle is that the player must find a hidden key in one of the rooms in order to unlock a door that leads to the next area. Through clues that you will find throughout the nights, you will find your way out of the orphanage and more importantly why you want to leave.
